page.title: 03A TYPICAL FARM(CONTINUED)
page.content:
{ UNSOLD CROPS. MR MASSEY EMPLOYS TWO FULL TIME AND ONE PART TIME WORKER,AGED BETWEEN THIRTY AND FIFTY. AN UNUSUAL FEATURE OF THE FARM IS THAT IT IS AN EXCLUSIVELY ARABLE FARM WHEREAS MOST OF THE OTHER FARMS IN THE AREA ARE LIVESTOCK OR DAIRY ONES.
{MR.&MRS DEVILLES FARM HARE HILL PARK THE FARM IS OWNED BY MR.DEVILLE AND HE REARS STOCK FOR HIS TWO BUTCHERS SHOPS,ONE IN ASHBOURNE AND THE OTHER IN UTTOXETER. WE VISITED IN JUNE SO THERE WERE NOT MANY BEASTS ABOUT BUT,IN WINTER THERE ARE MANY MORE.WE SAW 4 COWS,3 CALVES AND 15 BULLOCKS THERE WERE LIMOSIN,FRIESAN,HEREFORD,WELSH CROSSBRED AND CHAROLAIS BULLOCKS. THE FIELDS ARE EITHER MEADOWS OR
